text: Boubers-lès-Hesmond is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais département in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== Boubers-lès-Hesmond is a small village situated some 10 miles (16 km) east of Montreuil-sur-Mer on the D149 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Boubers- lès-Hesmond on the Quid website Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Boubers-lès-Hesmond
